name: Gravity Nord
description:
PLAY WITH SOUND ON, also, probably fullscreen.

This is just a prototype, I was working on my custom game engine, Nordic, and I stumbled upon this neat gravity trick. I refined it and made a level to show it off. Here you go.

If an enemy is in the air, and you flip, they will get flipped as well.

Move with WASD.

Shoot with Mouse.

Flip Gravity with  Shift.

Press Q and E to change weapons.

Melee enemies by running into them, but watch out, they melee back

You can walk on all surfaces that adjoin the one you are by an angle equal to or less than 90° For instance you can walk all the way around any of the "planets" that are to the left of spawn. Just experiment and have fun killing the mobs. 

You can jump down to the right from spawn for a small world, there is also a little tower to practice wall jumping on.

If you find any bugs, glitches, or have any ideas for features, please let me know!!
